author: robertc3
title: Free Oracle Community Price Feeds
description: ほとんどのプロジェクトでは、オフチェーンのデータフィードが必要です。これらのフィードは高価であり、十分な資金やサポートがないとプロジェクトが立ち上がらない可能性があります。

f6_assessments.q0: このプロジェクトの目的は、Cardanoコミュニティに無料のオラクルデータを提供することです。オラクルは有料のサービスであり、小さなプロジェクトにそのコストを含めることは、新しいプラットフォームやソリューションの開発を遅らせる障壁になりかねません。その点、ここでのアイデアは、この提案が資金提供されれば利益を得ることができる、これらの新しいDeFiプロジェクトのコストを減少させることで、DeFiエコシステムを後押しすることです。したがって、この提案は課題によく合致しています。また、もし資金が得られれば、チームは提案で提出されたのと同じ予算に合わせることになりますし、もしかしたらIOGもそうなるかもしれないので、この提案のインパクトは大きくなります。この提案のインパクトを測るためのKPIがいくつか欠けていますが、例えば、オラクルのソリューションを使用しているプロジェクトの数、フィードリクエストの数などが考えられます。
f6_assessments.q1: このチームは非常に優秀なようで、すでに前述のオラクルのソリューションを構築しています。提案書には彼らの情報は直接記載されていませんが、彼らのウェブサイトへのリンクがありますので、確認することができます。また、彼らはIndigo ProtocolやIOGなど、よく知られたプロジェクトや企業とパートナーシップを結んでいます。この提案の実現性は、彼らのオラクル開発の実現性にかかっています。なぜなら、この提案はオラクルなしでは意味をなさないからです。そのため、この提案には追加のリスクがありますが、チームの背景を考えるとそれほど大きなリスクではないかもしれません。ソリューションを実装するための計画は非常に明確でよく説明されていますが、3ヶ月、6ヶ月、12ヶ月の成功指標の他に、各ステップに関連する日付はありません。予算は12ヶ月間サービスを運営するのに十分であると述べていますが、あまり詳細は書かれていません。この点については、直接仕事をしていない人が評価するのは難しいので、より多くの情報があれば有益でした。
f6_assessments.q2: この提案の成功基準は明確で、測定しやすいものとなっています。しかし、この提案の詳細なロードマップには、各ステップがいつ実施されるのかという日付が記載されていないため、月次ベースでの進捗状況を把握するのは難しいかもしれません。  また、進捗状況や成果を測るためのKPIがいくつか欠けています。そのため、今後の提案では、KPIに加えて、より短い期間でどのように進捗状況を把握するのか、より詳細な情報を記載する必要があります。また、今回の場合、提供するフィードやオラクルデータはコミュニティの投票に依存するため、これらの指標についてはある程度の柔軟性が求められます。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is from charli3, one of the oracle projects building in the cardano network. At the moment, Charli3 is on the Ethereum network waiting for the  PAB and a functional bridge to join the Cardano network. They have decided to request funds, in order to give free data to projects building on the cardano ecosystem. Many are the startups that don't have access to much funds during the early phase of development. Paying for data feeds which are provided by oracle such as Charli3 can be expensive. The free data feed provided by Charli3 with the fund request will mostly benefit these project building on the cardano network. Needless to say that this action has a great value for the community. Furthermore, this project will be able to scale future challenges if additional funds are needed.
f6_assessments.q1: The project is very feasible based on the amount of information provided by the proposer. Charli3 has already built a product waiting to deploy on the Cardano network. There is enough evidence on the skills and experience of the team. The budget has been broken down into identifiable items. In fact the funds requested will be allocated to the free data feed that will be available to the community. The cost of development is handled by Charli3. If additional funding is needed, the Charli3 team has a plan laid out for that. Altogether, the Charli3 has a great idea that will benefit the builders in the Cardano network. I have a positive note on the feasibility of this project.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal includes a roadmap with reasonable milestones. The funds requested should last 12 months according to the team calculations. Metrics and KPIs are also outlined in the proposal. Altogether, the Charli3 team has explained really well what the proposal is all about .

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal nails the challenge category, frankly. I feel price feeds will be absolutely integral to cardano's defi, and many oracles are not in the process of integrating with cardano i.e. chainlink, wolfram blockchain labs etc. Many oracle solutions will be needed to provide a rich decentralized ecosystem of oracles and provide a hedge against a single oracle going down and taking all of cardano's defi with it.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team behind this proposal, Charlie3 is without question a highly respected team and very well known within the Cardano community. This proposal itself I believe has a very high probability of being implemented successfully, given the teams prior work and ongoing projects.

The only red flag I have is regards to how this price feed will be sustained, we understand that Charlie3 is meeting project catalyst funds contribution 50/50 which is awesome, but it appears to be clear that they will request more funds in the future which obviously creates a small bit of risk that the next funding round is not approved and I'm curious to whether or not that means Charlie3 will discontinue the price feeds. 

Other than that I do believe this proposal itself will be successful.
f6_assessments.q2:
The roadmap is detailed and milestones are made very clear, however I would actually like to see more specific details KPIs for the 3, 6, and 12 month milestones. 

Again I really feel like this team will deliver but the roadmap should not have any vague references and should be a little more specific!

f6_assessments.q0: Charli3 Great project. The proposal clearly achieves the objectives of the challenge and clearly adds value to Cardando. Although they mention that they already have many partners, they clearly have the resources, but it is interesting to give the community participation, in addition to matching the budgeted funds with their own resources.
f6_assessments.q1: The experience of the team is evident yet it provides detailed information about the experience and the work plan which is clearly sensible, feasible and auditable.
f6_assessments.q2:
The viability of the proposal is guaranteed since they request resources necessary to finance operating expenses of something that already exists and works. Team members are recognized in the Cardano community. I make this humble assessment as a mark of respect.
Greetings.

f6_assessments.q0:
Oracle services are vital to DeFI.
Removing as many entry barriers as possible will enable startup projects to have a higher chance of success.
I would love to have this proposal worked in a way that could make this 'free' service self-sustainable.
f6_assessments.q1: Charlie3 is a well-known member of our community with a service in the eminence of launching. This service will be provided to the community if funded.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided will be sufficient to audit the progress. However, I would have liked to have had more details regarding some of these topics (e.g., exactly how many price-feeds and for how long; will the funds definitely be managed by a DAO).

solution: Charli3は、この資金で補助された価格フィードを提供し、コミュニティによるセルフサービスのアクセスを可能にします。
experience: Charli3.ioは、CertiKの監査を受けたローンチプロジェクトをサポートする準備の整ったワーキングプロトタイプを持つ、分散型のオラクルソリューションです。
